head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRUEN, MARIAN STUYVESANT GRAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRUEN, MARIAN STUYVESANT GRAY

block.p: BRUEN-Marian Stuyvesant Gray. On 7 May, 2000. Beloved wife of Edward F.L. Bruen, mother of Marian A.B. Marrin and Nicholas L. Bruen, grandmother of Minet A.B. Marrin. Funeral services on Wednesday, 17 May at Church of the Advent, Westbury, L.I. at 11AM. Contributions in her memory may be made to Last Hope, Inc., for Animal Rescue and Rehabilitation, Box 61, Syosset, NY 11791.

BRUEN-Marian Stuyvesant Gray. On 7 May, 2000. Beloved wife of Edward F.L. Bruen, mother of Marian A.B. Marrin and Nicholas L. Bruen, grandmother of Minet A.B. Marrin. Contributions in her memory may be made to Last Hope, Inc., for Animal Rescue and Rehabilitation, Box 61, Syosset, NY 11791.
